title: GUIDANCE ON COMPLIANCE
fullText:
Generally compliance with Clause 4 can be demonstrated by compliance to the relevant product Standards. However compliance with Clause 4 may not be recognized if, for exampleâ€”

(a) There is a shortcoming in the product Standard;

(b) There is an inappropriate application of the product Standard; or

NOTE A representative but not exclusive list of product safety Standards is given in Appendix B.

(c) There is a failure to comply with good engineering practice as referred to in Clause 1

NOTE Further guidance to suppliers is provided in Appendix A.
